label: Bezděk, Jan & Renato Regalin.  2017. A review of Labidostomis species similar to L. longimana from southeastern Europe with descriptions of two new species from Greece and Turkey (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Cryptocephalinae: Clytrini). Zootaxa 4317(2): 321–337.
